briefdescription.para: Slot called whenever the view resizes or the scene contents change to enforce minimum scene sizes.
Slot to handle page scrolling of the playhead.

detaileddescription.para: If the playhead is outside the current scroll bounds, this function will scroll to where it is. Otherwise it will do nothing.
